entry.title: Why Is America Still Flying the A-10 Warthog, a Cold War Relic?
entry.content: Lawmakers protecting jobs and commerce for their districts block the military from retiring outdated equipment, impairing the effort to counter rapidly modernizing Chinese forces. This article is part of a series examining the problems confronting Americaâ€™s military.

entry.title: Russia Presses Attacks in Eastern Ukraine
entry.content: European leaders express outrage over video appearing to show Russian forces decapitating Ukrainian hostage.
